Pool.name: Pool

PoolManager.name: PoolManager
PoolManager.description:
Keeps track of all pools and allows for future debugging features to be easily
implemented.

classitems.description:
Hotswap reference for the allocation and renew callbacks.
Single point of entry for user friendly api and avoids using .apply(this, arguments).
classitems.name: create

return.description: - Newly created object or one from the pool.

params.name: obj
params.description: - Object being added to the pool.

classitems.description:
Does not create any new objects.
Hot swaps the create ref to the allocation callback for an easy api.
classitems.name: pull

return.description: - object from the pool or null if empty.

classitems.description:
Adds an object to the object pool for reuse.
Hot swaps the create ref to the object reuse callback for an easy api.
Disposes the object.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Dereferences/Clears all objects in the pool.
classitems.name: drain

classitems.description: Stores a new object pool to manage.
classitems.name: addPool

classitems.description: Creates and stores a new object pool to manage.
classitems.name: createPool
